item.title: Adding SSL to Pivotal Web Services (PWS)
item.description: If you have registered a custom domain that you would like to use with Pivotal Web Services (PWS) or any other Cloud Foundry instance, you may also want to use SSL, here’s how. These instructions were cribbed from the following places: Routes and Domains Pivotal SSL Certbot Let’s Encrypt Create a domain on PWS cf create-domain space-name example.com You must be an org manager to create domain like this.
